Table of Contents

Class Transformable

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics.Transforms
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

A type of object which can have Transforms operating upon it. An implementer of this class must call UpdateTransforms() to update and apply its Transforms.

public abstract class Transformable : ITransformable, IDependencyInjectionCandidate, ISourceGeneratedDependencyActivator

Properties

Clock

The clock that is used to provide the timing for this object's Transforms.

public abstract IFrameBasedClock Clock { get; set; }

Property Value

IFrameBasedClock

LatestTransformEndTime

The end time in milliseconds of the latest transform enqueued for this Transformable. Will return the current time value if no transforms are present.

public double LatestTransformEndTime { get; }

Property Value

double

RemoveCompletedTransforms

Whether to remove completed transforms from the list of applicable transforms. Setting this to false allows for rewinding transforms.

public virtual bool RemoveCompletedTransforms { get; }

Property Value

bool

Time

The current frame's time as observed by this class's Clock.

public FrameTimeInfo Time { get; }

Property Value

FrameTimeInfo

TransformDelay

Delay from the current time until new Transforms are started, in milliseconds.

protected double TransformDelay { get; }

Property Value

double

TransformStartTime

The starting time to use for new Transforms.

public double TransformStartTime { get; }

Property Value

double

Transforms

A lazily-initialized list of Transforms applied to this object.

public IEnumerable<Transform> Transforms { get; }

Property Value

IEnumerable<Transform>

Methods

AddTransform(Transform, ulong?)

Adds to this object a Transform which was previously populated using this object via PopulateTransform<TValue, TEasing, TThis>(TThis, Transform<TValue, TEasing, TThis>, TValue, double, in TEasing). Added Transforms are immediately applied, and therefore have an immediate effect on this object if the current time of this object falls within StartTime and EndTime. If Clock is null, e.g. because this object has just been constructed, then the given transform will be finished instantaneously.

public void AddTransform(Transform transform, ulong? customTransformID = null)

Parameters

transform Transform

The Transform to be added.

customTransformID ulong?

When not null, the TransformID to assign for ordering.

ApplyTransformsAt(double, bool)

Applies Transforms at a point in time. This may only be called if RemoveCompletedTransforms is set to false.

This does not change the clock time. 

public virtual void ApplyTransformsAt(double time, bool propagateChildren = false)

Parameters

time double

The time to apply Transforms at.

propagateChildren bool

Whether to also apply children's Transforms at time.

BeginAbsoluteSequence(double, bool)

Start a sequence of Transforms from an absolute time value (adjusts TransformStartTime).

public virtual IDisposable BeginAbsoluteSequence(double newTransformStartTime, bool recursive = true)

Parameters

newTransformStartTime double

The new value for TransformStartTime.

recursive bool

Whether this should be applied to all children. True by default.

Returns

IDisposable

An InvokeOnDisposal to be used in a using() statement.

Exceptions

InvalidOperationException

Absolute sequences should never be nested inside another existing sequence.

BeginDelayedSequence(double, bool)

Start a sequence of Transforms with a (cumulative) relative delay applied.

public IDisposable BeginDelayedSequence(double delay, bool recursive = true)

Parameters

delay double

The offset in milliseconds from current time. Note that this stacks with other nested sequences.

recursive bool

Whether this should be applied to all children. True by default.

Returns

IDisposable

An InvokeOnDisposal to be used in a using() statement.

ClearTransforms(bool, string)

Clears Transforms.

public virtual void ClearTransforms(bool propagateChildren = false, string targetMember = null)

Parameters

propagateChildren bool

Whether we also clear the Transforms of children.

targetMember string

An optional TargetMember name of Transforms to clear. Null for clearing all Transforms.

ClearTransformsAfter(double, bool, string)

Removes Transforms that start after time.

public virtual void ClearTransformsAfter(double time, bool propagateChildren = false, string targetMember = null)

Parameters

time double

The time to clear Transforms after.

propagateChildren bool

Whether to also clear such Transforms of children.

targetMember string

An optional TargetMember name of Transforms to clear. Null for clearing all Transforms.

FinishTransforms(bool, string)

Finishes specified Transforms, using their EndValue.

public virtual void FinishTransforms(bool propagateChildren = false, string targetMember = null)

Parameters

propagateChildren bool

Whether we also finish the Transforms of children.

targetMember string

An optional TargetMember name of Transforms to finish. Null for finishing all Transforms.

UpdateTransforms()

Resets TransformDelay and processes updates to this class based on loaded Transforms.

protected void UpdateTransforms()
